[GER] Resampling data

Thomas von Allmen

2018-11-06

Source: vignettes/resample.Rmd
resample.Rmd

Lade Beispiel Daten

library(magrittr)
fn <- system.file("extdata", "Zch_Stampfenbachstrasse_2010-2014.csv", package = "rOstluft.data", mustWork = TRUE)
data <- rOstluft::read_airmo_csv(fn)
data <- dplyr::filter(data, lubridate::year(starttime) == 2011)
data <- dplyr::arrange(data, starttime)
data
#> # A tibble: 243,381 x 6
#>    starttime           site               parameter interval unit    value
#>    <dttm>              <fct>              <fct>     <fct>    <fct>   <dbl>
#>  1 2011-01-01 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachs~ CO        min30    mg/m3   0.611
#>  2 2011-01-01 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachs~ NO        min30    µg/m3  26.2  
#>  3 2011-01-01 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachs~ NO2       min30    µg/m3  42.1  
#>  4 2011-01-01 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachs~ NOx       min30    ppb    43.0  
#>  5 2011-01-01 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachs~ O3        min30    µg/m3   2.19 
#>  6 2011-01-01 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachs~ PM10      min30    µg/m3  84.0  
#>  7 2011-01-01 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachs~ SO2       min30    µg/m3   5.07 
#>  8 2011-01-01 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachs~ Hr        min30    %Hr    91.9  
#>  9 2011-01-01 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachs~ p         min30    hPa   971.   
#> 10 2011-01-01 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachs~ RainDur   min30    min     0    
#> # ... with 243,371 more rows

Berechne Tagesmittelwerte:

rOstluft::resample(data, "d1")
#> # A tibble: 5,110 x 6
#>    starttime           site                 parameter interval unit  value
#>    <dttm>              <fct>                <fct>     <chr>    <fct> <dbl>
#>  1 2011-01-01 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachstr~ CO        d1       mg/m3 0.437
#>  2 2011-01-02 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachstr~ CO        d1       mg/m3 0.448
#>  3 2011-01-03 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachstr~ CO        d1       mg/m3 0.607
#>  4 2011-01-04 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachstr~ CO        d1       mg/m3 0.650
#>  5 2011-01-05 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachstr~ CO        d1       mg/m3 0.612
#>  6 2011-01-06 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachstr~ CO        d1       mg/m3 0.410
#>  7 2011-01-07 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachstr~ CO        d1       mg/m3 0.603
#>  8 2011-01-08 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachstr~ CO        d1       mg/m3 0.575
#>  9 2011-01-09 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachstr~ CO        d1       mg/m3 0.428
#> 10 2011-01-10 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachstr~ CO        d1       mg/m3 0.412
#> # ... with 5,100 more rows

Ups RainDur muss summiert werden:

data.d1 <- rOstluft::resample(data, "d1", statistic = list(RainDur="sum"))
dplyr::filter(data.d1, parameter == "RainDur")
#> # A tibble: 365 x 6
#>    starttime           site                parameter interval unit   value
#>    <dttm>              <fct>               <fct>     <chr>    <fct>  <dbl>
#>  1 2011-01-01 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachst~ RainDur   d1       min    17.2 
#>  2 2011-01-02 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachst~ RainDur   d1       min     1.13
#>  3 2011-01-03 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachst~ RainDur   d1       min     0   
#>  4 2011-01-04 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachst~ RainDur   d1       min     0   
#>  5 2011-01-05 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachst~ RainDur   d1       min     0   
#>  6 2011-01-06 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachst~ RainDur   d1       min   244.  
#>  7 2011-01-07 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachst~ RainDur   d1       min   172.  
#>  8 2011-01-08 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachst~ RainDur   d1       min   160.  
#>  9 2011-01-09 00:00:00 Zch_Stampfenbachst~ RainDur   d1       min   333.
